author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
During the Panny D, the media demanded that you acquiesce to whatever “the experts” proclaimed to be true. However, it turned out that nearly every prediction was wrong. That is because “the science” was nothing more than political science. And people like Anthony Fauci were going off of arbitrary reasoning, at best.

You didn’t need a medical degree to know the left was full of crap, as they fear mongered death counts without even discerning who died from COVID o
title: CNN's Kaitlan Collins Has Nothing To Say After RFK Jr. Calls Out Liberal Media For Demanding You Trust “The Science”

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Under the guise of being so inclusive, one high school in California has made some students feel so unsafe that at least one girl has been forced to change in her car for track practice.

Junior Audrey Vanherweg spoke at a recent Lucia Mar Unified School District Board of Education meeting where she claimed the reason she changes in her car is because she “feels way more comfortable in [her] car than in [her] own school's locker room."

Behold, what the left calls “compassion.”

🚨WATCH: A California high schooler says she changes for track practice in her car to avoid sharing the locker room with biological males.

Audrey Vanherweg is a junior on the track team at Lucia Mar Unified School District. Just last month, another girl on the team cried to the
title: Teen girl forced to change in her car because school demanded (trans) boys be allowed to change in the locker room with her

author: Kate Cornell
description:
Well, I did it.

Over the course of a weekend and a half I finished reading (former and current President) Donald J. Trump's The Art of the Deal. And, for starters, I have never been more convinced that Leftists don't know how to read. (This includes Karl Marx because we all know The Communist Manifesto was actually written by Engels, not that deadbeat Marx.)

<
title: To understand his big, beautiful bill, here's a review of Trump's classic "The Art of the Deal"

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
It’s unclear if Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson realized his job is to represent all the people of Chicago, despite their skin color, but the Department of Justice has decided he does not. And rather than take accountability for being a racist buffoon, he has decided to point the finger at those just trying to uphold the laws for all Americans.

Earlier this week, the DOJ launched an investigation into the City of Chicago after Mayor Brandon Johnson admitted to prioritizing one skin color over another when hiring public employees. And despite that being racist and evil, it also is not what you would call “legal.” Thus, the federal government is doing what the people voted for, which is attempting to end the woke culture war so that all Americans are treated equally.

However, Johnson cannot handle this and has resorted to almost cryin
title: Chicago Mayor melts down over DOJ investigating his racist practices of only hiring Black people
